description: The DRG segment contains diagnoses-related grouping information of various types. The DRG segment is used to send the DRG information, for example, for billing and medical records encoding.

fields.name: Diagnostic Related Group
fields.description: This field contains the DRG for the transaction. Interim DRG's could be determined for an encounter. For the identifier component, user-defined table 0055-DRG is used as the identifier for the user-defined table of values for this field . For the name of coding system component, send the grouper version and type.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced by the <text>. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: Name or description of the item in question. E.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression. Its data type is string (ST).

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Each coding system is assigned a unique identifier. This component will serve to identify the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier. ASTM E1238-94, Diagnostic, procedure, observation, drug ID, and health outcomes coding systems are identified in the tables in Section 7.1.4, Coding schemes. Others may be added as needed. When an HL7 table is used for a CE data type, the name of coding system component is defined as HL7nnnn where nnnn is the HL7 table number.

fields.name: Alternate Components
fields.description: These three components are defined analogously to the above for the alternate or local coding system. If the Alternate Text component is absent, and the Alternate Identifier is present, the Alternate Text will be taken to be the same as the Text component. If the Alternate Coding System component is absent, it will be taken to mean the locally-defined system.

fields.name: DRG Assigned Date/Time
fields.description: This field contains the time stamp to indicate the date and time that the DRG was assigned.

fields.name: DRG Approval Indicator
fields.description: This field indicates if the DRG has been approved by a reviewing entity. Refer to HL7 table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values.

fields.name: DRG Grouper Review Code
fields.description: User-defined table 0056 - DRG grouper review code is used as the HL7 identifier for the user-defined table of values for this field . This code indicates that the grouper results have been reviewed and approved.

fields.name: Outlier Type
fields.description: Refer to user-defined table 0083 - Outlier type for suggested values. Refers to the type of outlier that has been paid.

fields.name: Outlier Days
fields.description: This field contains the number of days that have been approved as an outlier payment.

fields.name: Outlier Cost
fields.description: This field contains the amount of money that has been approved for an outlier payment.

fields.name: Price
fields.description: Subcomponents of price: <quantity> & <denomination>

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: The first component is a quantity.

fields.name: Denomination
fields.description: The second component is the denomination in which the quantity is expressed. The values for the denomination component are those specified in ISO-4217. If the denomination is not specified, MSH-17-country code is used to determine the default. Example:

fields.name: Price Type
fields.description: A coded value, data type ID. Refer to HL7 table 0205 - Price type for valid values.

fields.name: From Value
fields.description: Each is a NM data type; together they specify the range. The range can be defined as either time or quantity. For example, the range can indicate that the first 10 minutes of the procedure has one price. Another repetition of the data type can use the range to specify that the following 10 to 60 minutes of the procedure is charged at another price per; a final repetition can specify that the final 60 to N minutes of the procedure at a third price.

fields.name: To Value
fields.description: See <from value> above.

fields.name: Range Units
fields.description: Subcomponents of range units: <identifier (ID)> & <text (ST)> & <name of coding system (ST)> & <alternate identifier (ID)> & <alternate text (ST)> & <name of alternate coding system (ST)>

fields.name: DRG Payor
fields.description: This field indicates the associated DRG Payor. Refer to user-defined table 0229 - DRG payor for suggested values.

fields.name: Outlier Reimbursement
fields.description: Where applicable, the outlier reimbursement amount indicates the part of the total reimbursement designated for reimbursement of outlier conditions (day or cost).
